DOC.brief_summary: An extension study safety tolerability SEP-363856 adult subject schizophrenia
DOC.brief_title: An Extension Study Safety Tolerability SEP-363856 Adult Subjects With Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: This 26 week , multiregional , open-label extension study design evaluate long-term safety tolerability SEP-363856 treatment subject schizophrenia complete 4 week double-blind treatment phase Study SEP361-201 . No statistical hypothesis test perform .
DOC.criteria: Subject must give write informed consent privacy authorization prior participation study able comply protocol , opinion investigator . Subject complete Study SEP361 201 Week 4 Subject take medication study drug purpose control schizophrenia symptom Study SEP361 201 . Female subject must negative urine pregnancy test Visit 7 Study SEP361 201 ; female postmenopausal ( define least 12 month spontaneous amenorrhea ) undergone hysterectomy bilateral oophorectomy exempt pregnancy test . Male subject female partner ( ) childbearing potential must agree avoid father child use acceptable method birth control screen least 30 day last study drug administration Subject answer `` yes '' `` suicidal ideation '' Item 4 ( active suicidal ideation intent act , without specific plan ) Item 5 ( active suicidal ideation specific plan intent ) CSSRS assessment Visit 7 Study SEP361 201 . Subjects answer `` yes '' question must refer Investigator follow evaluation . Subject clinically significant abnormality include physical examination , vital sign , ECG , laboratory test Visit 7 Study SEP361 201 investigator consultation medical monitor considers inappropriate allow participation study . Subject positive urine drug screen ( UDS ) breath alcohol test Visit 7 Study SEP361 201 . Subject pregnant lactating . Subject high risk noncompliance Investigator 's opinion . Subject opinion Investigator , unsuitable way participate study .
